item.title: Carillia Weathers
item.description: After her retirement from the Andoren Navy, Admiral Carillia Weathers asked to head the newly formed Office of Privateering Actions, a division of the Andoren Navy that grants letters of marque to privateers and tracks their actions. She gladly accepted the job, and her great experience makes her ideal for the position. Andoren privateers were officially sanctioned in 4709 AR, and their home port is Augustana.[1]
